alert.note: Alert for Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 2:00PM EDT until June 03 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Palm Beach County in southeastern Florida... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 200 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Boca Del Mar, or over Boca Raton, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Boca Raton, Delray Beach, Highland Beach, Mission Bay and Boca Pointe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
